title: CB1000R GREEN

title: Honda Activa 6G
details: The Activa 6G now looks like a scaled-down Activa 125.

title: Honda Activa 125
details: As part of its BS6 updates, the Honda Activa 125 gets an LED headlamp.

title: Honda Grazia

title: Yamaha YZF R15

title: Yamaha FZ S FI
details: The Yamaha FZ S FI is powered by 149cc BS6 engine which develops a power of 12.2 bhp

title: Yamaha MT 15
details: 155cc BS6 engine which develops a power of 18.23 bhp and a torque of 13.9 Nm

title: Yamaha FZ X
details: With both front and rear disc brakes, Yamaha FZ X comes up with anti-locking braking system.
